caption.p: Path diagram of the structural equation modelling showing the drivers of fennel insect communities and yield (Fisher’s C = 10.575, k = 8, p > 0.05). The width of arrows depends on effect’s size. *** p < 0.001; ** p < 0.01. (Arrow color helps visualize the sign of the effect, green: positive effect; red: negative effect). See Appendix D for details of the path-analysis settings.
